description.oldValue:
As part of our effort to enable data-linked diagrams in Visio for the web, this feature allows Visio Plan 1 and Visio Plan 2 subscribers to view and edit shape data fields in the Visio web editor for diagrams originally created in the Visio desktop app. Visio in Microsoft 365 users will be able to view shape data but will not be able to edit the data.
GA date: April CY2023
description.newValue: As part of our effort to enable data-linked diagrams in Visio for the web, this feature allows Visio Plan 1 and Visio Plan 2 subscribers to view and edit shape data fields in the Visio web editor for diagrams originally created in the Visio desktop app. Visio in Microsoft 365 users will be able to view shape data but will not be able to edit the data.
